ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: *SYSTEM UPGRADE, CHANGED SYSTEM NAME FROM TIME MANAGEMENT SYSTEM 9.0 TO TIMESHEET MANAGEMENT SYSTEM 11.0.1.0 - RECODING AND RESTRUCTURING JOBSHEET ENTRY WHEREBY USER CAN NOW ADD JOB/TASKS INSTEAD OF PROJECTS ALONE. - INSERT, UPDATE & DELETE STATEMENTS HAVE BEEN MODIFIED FOR ALL ENTRIES - SOME CHANGES ON QUERY STATEMENTS AND GRIDVIEW LOADING - MINOR CHANGES ON GUI AND PICK FORMS - FEASIBILITY STUDY, RISK FACTORS, TEST CASES & SCENARIOS - BUG FIXES

ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ

ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: UPDATE TIMESHEET MANAGEMENT SYSTEM 11.0 AS PER UPDATES MADE FROM HOME: - RECTIFY `CANNOT DELETE` AFTER INSERTING NEW JOBSHEET DETAIL - RECTIFY `TIME CALCULATION` ON JOBSHEET - RECTIFY `24HOUR` BUG WHEN KEY IN AS 24HOUR FORMAT, SYSTEM WILL REVERT IT BACK TO 12HOUR. - SET PICK PROJECT ONLY BEFORE OR ON DATE OF JOBSHEET. - SET PROJECT LISTING TO SEARCH BACK `TO DATE` AND 1 YEAR BACK.

ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: - MAJOR BUG FIXES ON DELETING ISSUE - VALIDATION ON TIME FROM & TIME TO - FULL SYSTEM TEST ON PROJECTS AND JOBSHEET MODULE - FULL SYSTEM KEYIN OF TIMESHEET FOR MANY USERS - ADDED IN REAL TIME ON PROGRAM - MINOR BUG FIXES - ADDED VALIDATION AT PICK JOB ENTRY - ADJUSTED GUI ON PICK JOB ENTRY

ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: - MODIFY PROJECT LISTING SCREEN TO SHOW ALTERNATE COLOR OF ROWS BASED ON STATUS. - `COMPLETED` WILL DISPLAY AS GREEN BACKGROUND/WHITE TEXT - `IN PROGRESS` WILL DISPLAY AS WHITE BACKGROUND/BLACK TEXT - MODIFY JOBSHEET ENTRY BY REMOVING CONTROL BOX - MODIFY KEYDOWN EVENT ON JOBSHEET IF IN EDIT MODE CANNOT ENFORCE CLOSE - MODIFY SAVE JOBSHEET BUTTON TO SAVE DOC DATE IF NOT SAME, BUT REJECTS IF JOBSHEET DATE ALREADY USED.

ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: - WORK ON JOBSHEET SAVE BUTTON. STILL DOES NOT WORK - TO ENHANCE ON, CLICKING ADD JOB/TASK OR ADD PROJECT WILL SET LAST `TIME TO` TO ENTRY SCREEN AS TIME FROM. - BUG FOR JOBSHEET DATE FOUND. IF KEYIN SINGLE DIGIT, IT WILL NOT VALIDATE DATETIMEPICKER (AS PER VB.NET FORUMS). THEREFORE DISABLING THE USER INPUT METHOD BUT TO ENFORCE USER TO SELECT THE DATE (JUST LIKE RBA WEBSITE)

ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: - UPDATE PROJECT ENTRY SCREEN ON TOOL STRIPS - BUG FIXED ON TOOL STRIP DISPLAYS - NEW LOGIC FLOW THAT PROJECTS CANNOT BE CANCELLED. IF PROJECT HAS BEEN CANCELLED BEFORE JOBS ARE DONE, CAN EDIT PROJECT DETAILS INSTEAD. - IF JOBS HAVE BEEN DONE FOR THAT PROJECT AND IT HAS BEEN CALLED OFF, PROJECT WILL BE SET AS COMPLETED. BECAUSE EMPLOYEE ALREADY MADE TIME FOR THAT PARTICULAR JOB. *10:59 TO 11:28 - BUG FIXES AND FINALIZE PROJECT ENTRY SCREEN
